snippet: In what he said would be his final news conference as N.B.A. commissioner, Stern said the ultimate aim was to have a European division with perhaps five teams in major cities like London, Berlin and Paris.
lead_paragraph: In what he said would be his final news conference as N.B.A. commissioner, Stern said the ultimate aim was to have a European division with perhaps five teams in major cities like London, Berlin and Paris.

headline.main: A Finale of Sorts for David Stern, Who Predicts a More Global N.B.A.
headline.print_headline: A Finale of Sorts for Stern, Who Predicts a More Global N.B.A.
